npc_output: I'm feeling a bit tired today, but I'm excited for the festival. Maybe you can help me with something? |r1|
Just preparing for the feast, trying to get everything ready on time. Want to help me mix the fresh ingredients? |r2|

player_input: Tyler, what are you working on?
npc_output: I'm trying to identify this rare herb. Care to take a look? |r5|
You have no idea... I'm so angry and tired. Maybe you can help me observe this test and take my mind off things? |r1|
It's been a long day, but I'm looking forward to the festival. Want to help me prepare the festive banquet? |r1|
Not much, just trying to learn from my mistakes. Want to help me with my training? |r2|
Just mixing up a new charm. Want to help me predict the effects? |r7|
It's going well, thanks. I'm just working on a new ritual. Want to help me mix the strange charm? |r8|
I was born ready. Want to help me train my horse? |r1|

player_input: Marisa, what's the plan for the council?
npc_output: I'm still working on the details, but I think I'll host a generous estate before the meeting. Want to help me with the invitation? |r1|
I'm thinking of singing a new song. Want to help me compose the music? |r2|
Not yet, but I'm still digging. Want to help me search the mine? |r3|
They're doing well, thanks. Want to help me stable the tidy bridle? |r1|
I'm thinking of summoning a new charm. Want to help me mix the secretive curse? |r3|

player_input: Robert, how's your magic coming along?
npc_output: It's going well, thanks. I'm just working on a new ritual. Want to help me cast the secretive ritual? |r5|
